Title: Provides that the entire parcel of land shall be eligible for an agricultural assessment when at least 85% of a single parcel of land is used for agricultural production
Summary: Provides that the entire parcel of land shall be eligible for an agricultural assessment when at least 85% of a single parcel of land is used for agricultural production.
LawCode: Amd ยง305, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to agricultural assessments of certain parcels of land
